alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa; Johnson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 26 at 5:55PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A snow shower will affect Northwestern Johnson...South central Benton and Northeastern Iowa counties through 630 PM CST... At 554 PM CST, a snow shower was located over High Amana, or 8 miles east of Marengo, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Visibility under 1 mile and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and observational data. IMPACTS...Difficulty seeing while driving. Locations impacted include... Marengo, Coralville, North Liberty, Tiffin, Oxford, Blairstown, Norway, Oakdale, Amana, Middle Amana, South Amana, Homestead, West Amana, Upper South Amana, Cosgrove, East Amana, Hannen Lake Park, Watkins, F.W. Kent Park, and High Amana. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 227 and 241. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 4. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
